
### a fork question (2)  {.smaller}


 
```
int x = 0;
int main() {
    pid_t pid = fork();
    int y = 0;
    if (pid == 0) {
        x += 1;
        y += 2;
    } else {
        x += 3;
        y += 4;
    }
    printf("%d %d\n", x, y);
}

```
 \\tikzmark{question start}[]{.my-small} Exercise: which (possibly multiple) are possible outputs? <table>
<tr><td>A. 1 2 (newline) 3 4</td><td>B. 1 2 (newline) 4 4</td><td>C. 1 2 (newline) 4 6</td></tr>
<tr><td>D. 3 4 (newline) 1 2</td><td>E. 3 4 (newline) 4 6</td><td>F. 4 6 (newline) 4 6</td></tr>
